list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: lose blood from the body as a result of injury or illness.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: vết cắt bị chảy máu đều đặn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: draw blood from (someone), especially as a once-common method of treatment in medicine.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he didn't bleed his patients with leeches
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: anh ta đã không chảy máu bệnh nhân của mình với những con đỉa

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: allow (fluid or gas) to escape from a closed system through a valve.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: open the valves and bleed air from the pump chamber
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Mở van và chảy máu từ buồng bơm

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a dye or color) seep into an adjacent color or area.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a lot of blood was lost from the placental bleed
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Rất nhiều máu đã bị mất do chảy máu nhau thai

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the escape of fluid or gas from a closed system through a valve.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the amount of air bleed from the compressor
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: lượng không khí chảy máu từ máy nén

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an instance of printing an illustration, design, or text to the edge of the page.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: it allows printing of a tabloid page with full bleed
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Nó cho phép in một trang báo lá cải với Bleed đầy đủ
